items.title: User Management
items.description: User registration, login, and profile management

items.title: User Registration
items.description: Users can register using email or social media accounts

items.title: Implement user registration with email
items.description: Allow users to register with their email address

items.title: Implement user registration with social media
items.description: Allow users to register with their social media accounts

items.title: User Login
items.description: Users can login with their email or social media accounts

items.title: Implement user login with email
items.description: Allow users to login with their email address

items.title: Implement user login with social media
items.description: Allow users to login with their social media accounts

items.title: Profile Management
items.description: Users can manage their profile information

items.title: Implement profile editing
items.description: Allow users to edit their profile information

items.title: Implement profile viewing
items.description: Allow users to view their profile information

items.title: Chatbot Interface
items.description: Chatbot for health information retrieval and symptom checking

items.title: Health Information Retrieval
items.description: Chatbot can retrieve and provide relevant health information

items.title: Implement health information retrieval
items.description: Allow chatbot to retrieve and provide relevant health information

items.title: Symptom Checker
items.description: Chatbot can help users identify potential health issues

items.title: Implement symptom checker
items.description: Allow chatbot to help users identify potential health issues

items.title: Health Tracking
items.description: Users can track their health metrics and progress over time

items.title: Health Metrics Tracking
items.description: Users can track various health metrics

items.title: Implement health metrics tracking
items.description: Allow users to track various health metrics

items.title: Wearable Integration
items.description: Optional integration with wearables for enhanced health tracking

items.title: Implement wearable integration
items.description: Allow integration with wearables for enhanced health tracking

items.title: Notifications and Reminders
items.description: System sends notifications for important health reminders

items.title: Push Notifications
items.description: System sends push notifications for important health reminders

items.title: Implement push notifications
items.description: Allow system to send push notifications for important health reminders

items.title: In-App Notifications
items.description: System provides in-app notifications for health updates and reminders

items.title: Implement in-app notifications
items.description: Allow system to provide in-app notifications for health updates and reminders
